duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop detailed mission analysis and integration of resources to determine capabilities to meet objectives.
Conduct tactical, operational, and strategic level research concerning the impact of existing and emerging EMSO threats to joint operations.
Analyze threat data and control receipt and dissemination of foreign intelligence information.
Evaluate emerging EMSO threats and present findings, conclusions, and recommendations based on evaluation results.
Make recommendations to service or joint tactics, weapon schools, or publications based on findings of JCER evaluations.
